![](http://elink.turing.ac.uk/o/4/eyJhaSI6NTkyMDc5NzIsImUiOiJ2aGVsbG9uQHR1cmluZy5hYy51ayIsInJpIjoiY29udGFjdC00ODgwYThjMzkyM2NlYzExOGM2MjAwMjI0ODQzNGZlYi02NzY5ZjdkMDQ2NWI0MGExYjY2NjgzNjE1NGUzYTI4MiIsInJxIjoicDEtYjIyMzQyLWUzODE1ZTA5OTFmZDQ0Y2Q5NTA3OTAwZWQ4ODdkYTEzIiwicGgiOm51bGx9/OVneav8445t4_KU9BE2tjw)

HTML link [here](https://eur01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Felink.turing.ac.uk%2Fm%2F1%2F59207972%2Fp1-b22342-e3815e0991fd44cd9507900ed887da13%2F1%2F65%2Fd9e9b8d3-742c-4656-875c-7e9b1bb1c5bf&data=05%7C01%7Cvhellon%40turing.ac.uk%7C7ebe925ec30c44963fb408dad909a76a%7C4395f4a7e4554f958a9f1fbaef6384f9%7C0%7C0%7C638060932745237049%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=w%2FEwWs3PV%2B0ga7IImBImL%2FCrCl89zfJilGIoPzEdlBY%3D&reserved=0)

![](https://file-eu.clickdimensions.com/turingacuk-ap7zg/files/bannernewsletter.png)

Welcome to December's Turing-Roche newsletter! Wishing you a restful upcoming holiday season. Here you can find what's new in the Turing-Roche strategic partnership and opportunities, events and news from both The Alan Turing Institute and Roche.

Our [five year partnership](https://eur01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Felink.turing.ac.uk%2Fc%2F7%%2FX-OXvVwT5Q5uuiZ_s9_k9A&data=05%7C01%7Cvhellon%40turing.ac.uk%7C7ebe925ec30c44963fb408dad909a76a%7C4395f4a7e4554f958a9f1fbaef6384f9%7C0%7C0%7C638060932745237049%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=FUnd8TZxI1fdLPsBrliwHmWSEc2OUUkePmPig9Rbvew%3D&reserved=0) was set up officially in June 2021 following a successful [Data Study Group](https://eur01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Felink.turing.ac.uk%2Fc%2F7%%2F65i7fW9O9zcb1SVcFCGCQg&data=05%7C01%7Cvhellon%40turing.ac.uk%7C7ebe925ec30c44963fb408dad909a76a%7C4395f4a7e4554f958a9f1fbaef6384f9%7C0%7C0%7C638060932745237049%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=26qa0iskhBDLvr2nESU9cU%2B477EXe%2BvVc72sgZmpOQc%3D&reserved=0) and a 12 week research project on lung cancer treatment. Our 'North Star' is **to enable the generation of insights to better understand patient and disease heterogeneity and its relevance to clinical outcomes at an unprecedented level of precision in order to improve clinical care.**

We will be covering multiple activities over the five years to work towards our North Star, as well as building strong connections and collaborations between the Alan Turing Institute, Roche and the wider community.

If you have anything you'd like featured in a future newsletter then please get in touch with Vicky Hellon, Community Manager for the partnership at <vhellon@turing.ac.uk>

If you would like to share this newsletter with relevant colleagues please direct them to sign-up [here](https://eur01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Felink.turing.ac.uk%2Fc%2F7%%2F8uMODw-U-E2tHN3lS1giMg&data=05%7C01%7Cvhellon%40turing.ac.uk%7C7ebe925ec30c44963fb408dad909a76a%7C4395f4a7e4554f958a9f1fbaef6384f9%7C0%7C0%7C638060932745237049%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=60fi9YF6v0H44tJ0vERKz0XlHxWSHKK4sxLhrgdRJo8%3D&reserved=0).

## Turing-Roche Strategic Partnership Updates

![](https://file-eu.clickdimensions.com/turingacuk-ap7zg/files/photo-1457530378978-8bac673b8062.jfif)

### Knowledge Share Series Event: Data and Software Engineering

**12 December 2022**

Join us for our [partnership knowledge share series](https://eur01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Felink.turing.ac.uk%2Fc%2F7%%2FIlL73MKwyZ2PwfHoxtDWQw&data=05%7C01%7Cvhellon%40turing.ac.uk%7C7ebe925ec30c44963fb408dad909a76a%7C4395f4a7e4554f958a9f1fbaef6384f9%7C0%7C0%7C638060932745237049%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=kzVqNB5DK1RyPEqoBDio6857cewcpIuCXQz9zRAPigA%3D&reserved=0). Our aim is to bring together members of the Turing and Roche networks and the wider scientific community to share different academic and industry perspectives on areas related to patient/treatment heterogeneity and data science more generally.

December's event is on the 12th on theme of Data and Software Engineering. We'll be hearing from Daniel Sabanes Bove, Senior Principal Data Scientist and Associate Director, Statistical Engineering at Roche and Martin O' Reilly, Director of Research Engineering at The Alan Turing Institute. Both will discuss how their software engineering teams are set up and operate respectively at Roche and the Turing, how they are working in a collaborative manner and examples of their work in the health sphere. You can register for the event [here](https://eur01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Felink.turing.ac.uk%2Fc%2F7%%2Fq09R00foRjXe_1xLUPhCDw&data=05%7C01%7Cvhellon%40turing.ac.uk%7C7ebe925ec30c44963fb408dad909a76a%7C4395f4a7e4554f958a9f1fbaef6384f9%7C0%7C0%7C638060932745237049%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=pYDHQbsXD3dry0rzRbro1TBNs6%2BBoWDGltslYK5beu0%3D&reserved=0).

You can also catch-up on previous recordings of our events at our [YouTube channel](https://eur01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Felink.turing.ac.uk%2Fc%2F7%%2FFqktb8qgIrTL3TJn-Qz3BQ&data=05%7C01%7Cvhellon%40turing.ac.uk%7C7ebe925ec30c44963fb408dad909a76a%7C4395f4a7e4554f958a9f1fbaef6384f9%7C0%7C0%7C638060932745237049%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=5UT59B80%2BCA8FKLbcsJ6oJfdj9pXSdSC9SQo23yBj0s%3D&reserved=0).

### New Video Series: Academic and Industry Perspectives

We have launched the first video in our new Academic and Industry Perspectives series. The series brings together a member of the Alan Turing Institute and a member of Roche to discuss their perspectives on AI and data science topics and their respective work in academia and industry. Our first video is from Dr Sarah McGough, Senior Data Scientist at Roche and Professor Ben MacArthur, Deputy Programme Director for Health and Medical Sciences at the Turing Institute. You can watch it [here](https://eur01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Felink.turing.ac.uk%2Fc%2F7%%2FaAeoID2_CvE4joF5jsYEkw&data=05%7C01%7Cvhellon%40turing.ac.uk%7C7ebe925ec30c44963fb408dad909a76a%7C4395f4a7e4554f958a9f1fbaef6384f9%7C0%7C0%7C638060932745237049%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=507Dtah9%2FTY1oSi3NzJdJdU%2Fnjk7pNlaFnsQZ5MY2wE%3D&reserved=0).

If you'd be interested in taking part in this video series then please get in touch with our Community Manager Vicky Hellon at <vhellon@turing.ac.uk> 

## Current Opportunities at The Alan Turing Institute and Roche

![](https://file-eu.clickdimensions.com/turingacuk-ap7zg/files/group_study_working__0.jpg)

### Turing Institute Causal Inference Interest Group relaunches monthly seminars

The [Turing Institute Interest Groups](https://eur01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Felink.turing.ac.uk%2Fc%2F7%%2FE6ErOHrb0wWLRXsCp6cRCw&data=05%7C01%7Cvhellon%40turing.ac.uk%7C7ebe925ec30c44963fb408dad909a76a%7C4395f4a7e4554f958a9f1fbaef6384f9%7C0%7C0%7C638060932745237049%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=7SPQ7ikNRQ%2FZ7Trw6yAuLv1Y6hgkmDAQE8Gvbr2mmLw%3D&reserved=0) enable researchers to gather around shared areas of interest in data science and AI. They are open for anyone to join. The Causal Inference Interest Group is re-launching its monthly seminar series with the next event on the 12th December. You can find the schedule [here](https://eur01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Felink.turing.ac.uk%2Fc%2F7%%2F5C5D85zQgi4Vi3mZqSwKrA&data=05%7C01%7Cvhellon%40turing.ac.uk%7C7ebe925ec30c44963fb408dad909a76a%7C4395f4a7e4554f958a9f1fbaef6384f9%7C0%7C0%7C638060932745237049%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=VGShEI0Nz9aFQF6%2Fpg%2BbcFjl2%2FXNyXOOwvbLshle56g%3D&reserved=0) and more info on the group [here](https://eur01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Felink.turing.ac.uk%2Fc%2F7%_X2NsZGVlPXZZNHFxWDR6TXhSVkM1WWkwSkFQUFNiNER5ZGtKZElMNlpGNFdjakw5TkZ6MFNCU1J2eGhhUG9uWk5nWEp0XzcmcmVjaXBpZW50aWQ9Y29udGFjdC00ODgwYThjMzkyM2NlYzExOGM2MjAwMjI0ODQzNGZlYi02NzY5ZjdkMDQ2NWI0MGExYjY2NjgzNjE1NGUzYTI4MiZlc2lkPTQ1MDdkNmIzLTY2NzUtZWQxMS04MWFjLTAwMjI0ODNmNzIzMSJ9%2F1_QgEEc3l8DGTHNeS_GySQ&data=05%7C01%7Cvhellon%40turing.ac.uk%7C7ebe925ec30c44963fb408dad909a76a%7C4395f4a7e4554f958a9f1fbaef6384f9%7C0%7C0%7C638060932745237049%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=weX1ccTKnVTSdh20x5ZB9vdHrRHKEgz9hQmJXrxejyY%3D&reserved=0).

### Roche Job Opportunity: Senior AI Scientist in Multimodal Translational Medicine

This Senior AI Scientist role is based in San Francisco. The successful applicant will apply advanced data analysis skills and machine learning in collaboration with a group of computational and biological scientists to perform translational oncology research around multimodal translational data sets for programs in clinical development. Find out more and how to apply [here](https://eur01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Felink.turing.ac.uk%2Fc%2F7%_%2F5tCVwDclHasucbPUEuEYww&data=05%7C01%7Cvhellon%40turing.ac.uk%7C7ebe925ec30c44963fb408dad909a76a%7C4395f4a7e4554f958a9f1fbaef6384f9%7C0%7C0%7C638060932745393325%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=6Uz2lKspA%2B0xsjnbt4stQT4r%2FPh7VqRBtuNY%2F25n%2BqM%3D&reserved=0).

### Research Software Engineering in Data and AI Workshop at Warwick

**Deadline for applications: 12 December 2022**

**Workshop date: 15-17 February 2023**

The Alan Turing Institute and the University of Warwick are collaborating to hold a workshop for Research Software Engineers (RSEs) and other Digital Research Infrastructure professionals (DRIs) who support research in the field of Data Science and Artificial Intelligence. The workshop will provide an excellent opportunity for networking and knowledge exchange. It is open to staff from any UK research institution to apply for a fully funded place. More info and how to apply [here](https://eur01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Felink.turing.ac.uk%2Fc%2F7%%2FmcanMGE1jc1jt0okGhFo9w&data=05%7C01%7Cvhellon%40turing.ac.uk%7C7ebe925ec30c44963fb408dad909a76a%7C4395f4a7e4554f958a9f1fbaef6384f9%7C0%7C0%7C638060932745393325%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=PiD0LcmexL%2F%2FXdH9ay4uezJ7mmuYk%2BFnN3j754Xg5QI%3D&reserved=0).

### Roche Data Science MSc Degree Apprenticeship

**Deadline for applications: 31 January 2023**

The Roche Data Science Apprenticeship programme is open for applications. During this two year apprenticeship successful applicants will work towards a fully funded Masters degree (MSc) in Data Science whilst gaining valuable 'on the job' experience and mentoring from talented experts at Roche. The position sits within the Product Development Informatics chapter and the apprentice will work closely with cross-functional teams to solve complex data problems enabling PD to transform data into actionable insights. More and how to apply [here](https://eur01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Felink.turing.ac.uk%2Fc%2F7%%2FmGpUHvBBUfQl2OOKhFooBg&data=05%7C01%7Cvhellon%40turing.ac.uk%7C7ebe925ec30c44963fb408dad909a76a%7C4395f4a7e4554f958a9f1fbaef6384f9%7C0%7C0%7C638060932745393325%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=7yrxqjKsVKpvnZfKrxPZdULae0iGcLmsuWdYV5MqIJ0%3D&reserved=0).

### Turing PhD Enrichment Scheme now open for applications

**Deadline for applications: 18 January 2023**

The Turing Enrichment Scheme is designed to give PhD students at a UK university the opportunity to enhance, refresh, and broaden their research with the Turing's community. Placement Award holders receive funding to physically access the Institute's facilities whilst also building both online communities and facilitating other activities such as attending training courses, going to conferences and visiting collaborators. Find out more about the scheme and how to apply [here](https://eur01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Felink.turing.ac.uk%2Fc%2F7%%2FOJvaPYiAnk8j9qyHJHIS0Q&data=05%7C01%7Cvhellon%40turing.ac.uk%7C7ebe925ec30c44963fb408dad909a76a%7C4395f4a7e4554f958a9f1fbaef6384f9%7C0%7C0%7C638060932745393325%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=%2BhGbvGTJz7YO%2BI7kQXpBvKN4jvnK%2FwrNQlGVEBjcAuo%3D&reserved=0).

Current Turing Institute [job vacancies](https://eur01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Felink.turing.ac.uk%2Fc%2F7%%2FveNH0yr2VQSA-5D3Y9GDvg&data=05%7C01%7Cvhellon%40turing.ac.uk%7C7ebe925ec30c44963fb408dad909a76a%7C4395f4a7e4554f958a9f1fbaef6384f9%7C0%7C0%7C638060932745393325%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=PbtOAE6hYLa190IGUxWWsjEeZ8Oxv8iOHUMlK8N43Lc%3D&reserved=0)

Current Roche [job vacancies](https://eur01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Felink.turing.ac.uk%2Fc%2F7%%2FiyDtr74JNXRQL1_DkapZOA&data=05%7C01%7Cvhellon%40turing.ac.uk%7C7ebe925ec30c44963fb408dad909a76a%7C4395f4a7e4554f958a9f1fbaef6384f9%7C0%7C0%7C638060932745393325%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=dOv2jmeR8SuyrxLVl7jyQSuoUS%2FtEsHI%2F3Ef6J8fnMw%3D&reserved=0)

## Events

![](https://file-eu.clickdimensions.com/turingacuk-ap7zg/files/ags-0057_800-px-wide.jpg)

### Westminster Health Forum: Next steps for genomics in the UK

**13 December 2022**

This virtual event will be an opportunity to explore the future of genomic transformation in the NHS, looking at screening and personalised medicine, workforce education and training, and the options for pharmacogenomics in clinical practice. Find out more and how to register [here](https://eur01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Felink.turing.ac.uk%2Fc%2F7%_%2FaDaLOey6hzxXql3IT4q4NQ&data=05%7C01%7Cvhellon%40turing.ac.uk%7C7ebe925ec30c44963fb408dad909a76a%7C4395f4a7e4554f958a9f1fbaef6384f9%7C0%7C0%7C638060932745393325%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=datWwHnIyIeyHKDs0MrC4ICZg3b%2BHlAWnKVSO4XiqHY%3D&reserved=0).

### Statistical Methods for Health Equity Series: Dr Alice Popejoy

**15 December 2022**

The Statistical Methods for Health Equity Series is a monthly online series co-hosted by the Data Science for Health Equity community, the Alan Turing Institute, and the Department of Statistical Science at University College London. For their third talk in the series, they will be welcoming Dr Alice Popejoy at UC Davis to talk about her work, which is situated at the intersections of genomics, health, data science, and the attending ethical, legal, and social implications (ELSI). Registration [here](https://eur01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Felink.turing.ac.uk%2Fc%2F7%%2Fqp8ChDFwpAQPnBvqgwaavQ&data=05%7C01%7Cvhellon%40turing.ac.uk%7C7ebe925ec30c44963fb408dad909a76a%7C4395f4a7e4554f958a9f1fbaef6384f9%7C0%7C0%7C638060932745393325%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=JZI7ObuSdc6V4R7C5GIjnZIcOcu4zC7APRAuGbJz5Aw%3D&reserved=0).

### 3 Day Course on Structural Causal Modelling & Inference

**Course date: 17-19 January 2023**

Health Data Research UK will be running a three-day course led by Max Little (University of Birmingham) on "Structural Causal Modelling & Inference" as part of its PhD Immersion Weeks programme at the Oxford Martin School. Applications for places are currently open. For more details please see this [webpage](https://eur01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Felink.turing.ac.uk%2Fc%2F7%_X2NsZGVlPXZZNHFxWDR6TXhSVkM1WWkwSkFQUFNiNER5ZGtKZElMNlpGNFdjakw5TkZ6MFNCU1J2eGhhUG9uWk5nWEp0XzcmcmVjaXBpZW50aWQ9Y29udGFjdC00ODgwYThjMzkyM2NlYzExOGM2MjAwMjI0ODQzNGZlYi02NzY5ZjdkMDQ2NWI0MGExYjY2NjgzNjE1NGUzYTI4MiZlc2lkPTQ1MDdkNmIzLTY2NzUtZWQxMS04MWFjLTAwMjI0ODNmNzIzMSJ9%2FBW8GHXeJTLbHuE7S26RBsQ&data=05%7C01%7Cvhellon%40turing.ac.uk%7C7ebe925ec30c44963fb408dad909a76a%7C4395f4a7e4554f958a9f1fbaef6384f9%7C0%7C0%7C638060932745393325%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=UEQAk9yS1CaR%2FEiZAurBUy0o8H3uQRc92sLrQmOf3pI%3D&reserved=0).

### 2023 American Causal Inference Conference (ACIC)

**Deadline for submissions for courses and abstracts: 6 January 2023**

**Conference date: 24-26 May 2023**

ACIC is an interdisciplinary conference designed to bring together researchers, students, and practitioners of causal inference with emphasis on theory, methodology, and application. The conference is inviting submissions for short courses and abstracts. Find out more and how to submit [here](https://eur01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Felink.turing.ac.uk%2Fc%2F7%%2FfR8a0nJLh246FJj0nCoaMA&data=05%7C01%7Cvhellon%40turing.ac.uk%7C7ebe925ec30c44963fb408dad909a76a%7C4395f4a7e4554f958a9f1fbaef6384f9%7C0%7C0%7C638060932745393325%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=l3RXDIyV9uYNEe9CA4pnMPGGDOWCF1gFM7LKR4NcCTY%3D&reserved=0).

## Other Opportunities

![](https://file-eu.clickdimensions.com/turingacuk-ap7zg/files/alex-shutin-204369-unsplash.jpg)

### Call for Papers - Counterfactual Prediction Models in Medicine at BMC Medical Informatics and Decision Making 

**Deadline to submit: 30 June 2023**

BMC Medical Informatics and Decision Making is calling for paper submissions for a collection on Counterfactual Prediction Models in Medicine. Community member and Turing Fellow Matthew Sperrin is a guest editor on the collection. They are welcoming both methodological and applied papers in this space- find out more [here](https://eur01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Felink.turing.ac.uk%2Fc%2F7%%2F2LiH0a-YlLWPrZcLfmu0YQ&data=05%7C01%7Cvhellon%40turing.ac.uk%7C7ebe925ec30c44963fb408dad909a76a%7C4395f4a7e4554f958a9f1fbaef6384f9%7C0%7C0%7C638060932745393325%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=iWOjryeF5FoTee3rmIgjIwiWi2FEsWG%2FCSh9i4X4MrY%3D&reserved=0).

### Job: University of Southampton Lecturer in Applied Health Statistics

**Deadline for applications: 09 January 2023**

The University of Southampton are looking for a Lecturer in Applied Health Statistics to join the School of Health Sciences. The successful applicant will work with leading research teams by contributing to securing external funding awards and delivering funded studies, undertaking and supporting analyses and providing statistical support and advice. They will deliver education in research methods and data analysis, and provide support and advice to postgraduate students. More info and how to apply [here](https://eur01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Felink.turing.ac.uk%2Fc%2F7%%2Fq--wzWRGecvdDxipkrvxkA&data=05%7C01%7Cvhellon%40turing.ac.uk%7C7ebe925ec30c44963fb408dad909a76a%7C4395f4a7e4554f958a9f1fbaef6384f9%7C0%7C0%7C638060932745393325%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=5QBrL%2FD6c5WRsJJBy2vIjagIZzn3l8IvWCpJNxhiRqo%3D&reserved=0).

### Apply for PhD Programme at University of Edinburgh UKRI Centre for Doctoral Training (CDT) in Biomedical Artificial Intelligence

The University of Edinburgh CDT is now recruiting for its fully funded 4-year PhD programme, to start in September 2023. Building on the tradition of world-leading research and innovation at the University of Edinburgh, the Centre is training a new generation of interdisciplinary scientists who will help shape the future of applications of AI in biomedicine. The programme offers extensive choice of projects at the intersection of AI, biomedicine and social sciences and opportunities for a range of training, international collaborations and regular events. Find out more and how to apply [here](https://eur01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Felink.turing.ac.uk%2Fc%2F7%_aTMwMHA0NTkwJl9jbGRlZT12WTRxcVg0ek14UlZDNVlpMEpBUFBTYjREeWRrSmRJTDZaRjRXY2pMOU5GejBTQlNSdnhoYVBvblpOZ1hKdF83JnJlY2lwaWVudGlkPWNvbnRhY3QtNDg4MGE4YzM5MjNjZWMxMThjNjIwMDIyNDg0MzRmZWItNjc2OWY3ZDA0NjViNDBhMWI2NjY4MzYxNTRlM2EyODImZXNpZD00NTA3ZDZiMy02Njc1LWVkMTEtODFhYy0wMDIyNDgzZjcyMzEifQ%2FE7cw9CB3PhArGiNJWfHvLQ&data=05%7C01%7Cvhellon%40turing.ac.uk%7C7ebe925ec30c44963fb408dad909a76a%7C4395f4a7e4554f958a9f1fbaef6384f9%7C0%7C0%7C638060932745393325%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=tacY9oq7Z1Dn%2Br74yhM8TuXcwXOcpuGWtR5D%2FIJNRLM%3D&reserved=0).

### Applications open for Clinical AI Fellowships

**Deadline for applications: 02 January 2023**

The London Medical Imaging & AI Centre for Value Based Healthcare is launching its second cohort of Fellowships in Clinical Artificial Intelligence. The Fellowship is a year-long programme which is integrated part-time alongside the clinical training of doctors and dentists approaching consultancy.  This unique programme will give the NHS a generation of leaders who are trained to deliver the transformational power of Artificial Intelligence in healthcare. Application info [here](https://eur01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Felink.turing.ac.uk%2Fc%2F7%_X2NsZGVlPXZZNHFxWDR6TXhSVkM1WWkwSkFQUFNiNER5ZGtKZElMNlpGNFdjakw5TkZ6MFNCU1J2eGhhUG9uWk5nWEp0XzcmcmVjaXBpZW50aWQ9Y29udGFjdC00ODgwYThjMzkyM2NlYzExOGM2MjAwMjI0ODQzNGZlYi02NzY5ZjdkMDQ2NWI0MGExYjY2NjgzNjE1NGUzYTI4MiZlc2lkPTQ1MDdkNmIzLTY2NzUtZWQxMS04MWFjLTAwMjI0ODNmNzIzMSJ9%2F2j0HAMFQ4wxZ6YengdQqGw&data=05%7C01%7Cvhellon%40turing.ac.uk%7C7ebe925ec30c44963fb408dad909a76a%7C4395f4a7e4554f958a9f1fbaef6384f9%7C0%7C0%7C638060932745393325%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=7zgzXpmUXhwxZ9GcFBS%2BKSkMhcW8DwroXggdtjz3PXA%3D&reserved=0).

## Publication of the Month

![](https://file-eu.clickdimensions.com/turingacuk-ap7zg/files/patrick-tomasso-oaqk7qqnh_c-unsplash2.jpg)

**A meta-analytic framework to adjust for bias in external control studies**

December's [publication of the month](https://eur01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Felink.turing.ac.uk%2Fc%2F7%_X2NsZGVlPXZZNHFxWDR6TXhSVkM1WWkwSkFQUFNiNER5ZGtKZElMNlpGNFdjakw5TkZ6MFNCU1J2eGhhUG9uWk5nWEp0XzcmcmVjaXBpZW50aWQ9Y29udGFjdC00ODgwYThjMzkyM2NlYzExOGM2MjAwMjI0ODQzNGZlYi02NzY5ZjdkMDQ2NWI0MGExYjY2NjgzNjE1NGUzYTI4MiZlc2lkPTQ1MDdkNmIzLTY2NzUtZWQxMS04MWFjLTAwMjI0ODNmNzIzMSJ9%2F1EbmwAljEwL6lwe8EU7HJw&data=05%7C01%7Cvhellon%40turing.ac.uk%7C7ebe925ec30c44963fb408dad909a76a%7C4395f4a7e4554f958a9f1fbaef6384f9%7C0%7C0%7C638060932745393325%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=0M2YM3J%2FwdaMYHqP60U5F7Xzhk%2FIh0KDytswMpR4Xto%3D&reserved=0) (preprint version [here](https://eur01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Felink.turing.ac.uk%2Fc%2F7%_X2NsZGVlPXZZNHFxWDR6TXhSVkM1WWkwSkFQUFNiNER5ZGtKZElMNlpGNFdjakw5TkZ6MFNCU1J2eGhhUG9uWk5nWEp0XzcmcmVjaXBpZW50aWQ9Y29udGFjdC00ODgwYThjMzkyM2NlYzExOGM2MjAwMjI0ODQzNGZlYi02NzY5ZjdkMDQ2NWI0MGExYjY2NjgzNjE1NGUzYTI4MiZlc2lkPTQ1MDdkNmIzLTY2NzUtZWQxMS04MWFjLTAwMjI0ODNmNzIzMSJ9%2F0jWF8WVN0ch804GJJAhCgg&data=05%7C01%7Cvhellon%40turing.ac.uk%7C7ebe925ec30c44963fb408dad909a76a%7C4395f4a7e4554f958a9f1fbaef6384f9%7C0%7C0%7C638060932745393325%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=2nNwcdaAhwagzBdmYRQt7OSmvFxpoQHjeZv5ttN5lsc%3D&reserved=0)) is from our Turing-Roche Partnership Deputy Lead Chris Harbron and his Roche/Genentech colleagues. Published in Pharmaceutical Statistics, the paper describes the development of a meta-analytic framework that uses historical reference studies to adjust a log hazard ratio estimate in a new external control study for its additional bias and variability. The authors then illustrate their approach with a simulation study and an empirical example based on reference studies for advanced non-small cell lung cancer.

## The Turing-Roche Strategic Partnership team

![](https://file-eu.clickdimensions.com/turingacuk-ap7zg/files/rocheteam.png)

-   Álvaro Sahun, Turing Institute, Turing-Roche Partnership Research Project Manager
